thread.title: John White
thread.title_full: TShirt Studio reviewed by John White

author: John White
title: John White
text: I've ordered at least half a dozen customised t-shirts from TShirt Studio in the last 12 months and they have all been of the highest quality print and t-shirt! The latest is superb and I've passed on the details to several people who've asked where I got it from. The service TShirt Studio provide is second to none and I very highly recommend them for all custom printing! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
